concept.title: 504.7103 Head of the contracting activity responsibilities.

conbody.p: The head of the contracting activity consistent with their delegated authority shall establish acquisition policies, procedures and guidance concerning acquisition reviews for their respective organization(s) in support of this subpart.

li.p: (a) These acquisition policies, procedures and guidance shall include, but be not limited to:
(1) Commensurate with the risk, complexity, and criticality of the acquisition or contract actionâ€“
(i) Pre-award acquisition reviews (e.g., contract review board, peer reviews); and
(2) A process for capturing best practices and innovative approaches to share with the acquisition workforce.
